title: The billion-dollar blind spot: The infrastructure data gap plaguing utilities
description: ikeGPS' Brett Willitt writes that many distribution utilities can't reliably answer a fundamental question: Which assets require investment and which do not?
content: ikeGPS' Brett Willitt writes that many distribution utilities can't reliably answer a fundamental question: Which assets require investment and which do not?
